successes.title: Wipebook
successes.description: Generate amazing ideas with our reusable whiteboard notebook!

Pledges.description: Wipebook: Get your very own original wipebook!
Wipebook 2.0: Get the new and improved Wipebook 2.0 !
Grid-Wipebook 2.0: Get the new Grid-Wipebook 2.0! The new Grid-Wipebook 2.0 has grid pages instead of lined sheets!

UOttawa Special!: For University of Ottawa Students (Canada) Get your very own Wipebook 2.0 and a pack of correctable markers. (Instead of shipping the books, we will setup a time and place on campus for pickup! No shipping required!)
White-Wipebook 2.0: Get the new White-Wipebook 2.0! The new White-Wipebook 2.0 has blank pages instead of lined sheets!
Wipebook 2.0: Get the new and improved Wipebook 2.0 and a pack correctable markers!
Get the new Grid-Wipebook 2.0 and a pack of correctable markers! The Grid-Wipebook 2.0 has grids instead of lined sheets!

Mixed-Wipebook 2.0: Get your very own Wipebook 2.0 with mixed sheets! This includes blank, lined ,grid, isometric,dots and sheet music pages! (more page options may be added). Also get a pack of correctable markers!
Get the new White-Wipebook 2.0 and a pack of correctable markers! The White-Wipebook 2.0 has blank pages instead of lined sheets!
Grid+Line Set: Get two Wipebooks; one that has lined sheets, one with grid sheets, and 2 correctable markers!
Mixed+Line Set: Get two Wipebooks; one that has lined sheets, one with mixed sheets, and 2 correctable markers!
White+Line Set: Get two Wipebooks; one that has lined sheets, one with blank sheets, and 2 correctable markers!

Custom Wipebook 2.0: Get the new and improved Wipebook 2.0 with custom front and back covers. Send us your designs and we'll make sure your book is made specifically for you! A pack of correctable markers is also included.
Wipebook Super Set- Get a mixed, grid and lined Wipebook 2.0 with 3 packs of correctable markers!
Ãœber Set: Get Wipebook 2.0 , Grid-Wipebook 2.0 , Mix-Wipebook 2.0, White-Wipebook 2.0 and 4 packs of correctable markers!
